label: Interviewee: Gesturing, Mimicking, Body Language (squinting, smiling)

body.value: But I started calling in stuff to the writers, you know I was in the field, and we had a whole â€“ It was a big fire, national story. And they kept saying, "Where'd you get this? You're getting stuff nobody else has. Are you sure they said that?" I said, "Yeah." And afterwards, I figured out, and they figured out, Bally's was the only hotel in those days to have an office in Mexico City. They had 800 Mexicans there celebrating a holiday on a trip, you know, as a group. *quieter, smiles* Well, I found all these people speaking Spanish. I was the only Latino reporter there. So I got a lot of quotes nobody else got. A lot of stories nobody else got.
